item.title: Server interface help
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Search for

MainHelpMenu

Put it under that menu void.
Then, when you want it to be called on, use this.
Command"

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("name")) { WhatYouWant(); }

NPC"

else if (NPCID == ID) { WhatYouWant(); }

Read full topic
